sentences.en: I can see all the traditional signalling flags neatly stowed on shelves on the bridge—so neatly, in fact, that I suspect they might never have been used, together with the sextant, the flares.
sentences.cn: 我可以看见所有传统的信号旗整齐地装载在桥架上-如此整洁，事实上，我怀疑它们和六分仪及闪光信号一样，可能从未被用过。

sentences.en: Is sextant still widely used for navigation?
sentences.cn: 六分仪现在仍然广泛应用于航海 吗 ?

sentences.en: Other early instruments included the sextant and the astrolabe.
sentences.cn: 另外的早期仪器还有六分仪和星盘.

sentences.en: Sextant can be used for exploration and navigation .

sentences.en: To define latitude and longitude coordinates for a location on the Earth, at minimum, you must be able to see the stars or the Sun and have a sextant and clock that displays time in GMT.
sentences.cn: 确定地球上某个位置的经度和纬度坐标的最低需求是，你至少能够看到星星和太阳，并具备一个六分仪和能够显示 GMT 时间的时钟 T。

sentences.en: To navigate , they must fix their sextant on something concrete.
sentences.cn: 要行动, 就必须要立足于某个坚实的事物上.

sentences.en: Unlike decimal coordinates, which you can determine using a sextant and a chronometer, you cannot determine UTM coordinates without calculations.
sentences.cn: 十进制坐标可通过一个六分仪和一个记时计确定，与此不同的是，必须通过计算才能确定 UTM 坐标。
